text: <@UCBLGCB4L> depends on how long the intro is. typical read time for the average blog is less than 1 minute, so its up to you on how much of that you want that first paragraph to consume
got it thank you <@U02502HG5JR>, was just wondering if the intro copy is the same across all 4 posts in the series would google punish us for duplicate content?

<@UCBLGCB4L> Keep in mind that each blog should target different keywords. You also need to just ensure your tags are different. This won't trigger any sort of duplicate content penalty, so you should be fine.
awesome thank you <@U02502HG5JR> appreciate the help!
